content.query:
CREATE DATABASE NewYork_Airbnb
     COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;
GO

USE NewYork_Airbnb;
GO
/* Create a password for credential */
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Nigeria@10'; -- 'Add a encryption key'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL Manageid
WITH
    IDENTITY='Managed Identity'; -- 'Using my Azure Managed indentity'
GO

/* CREATE EXTERNAL DATASOURCE */
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE Airbnb
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://ffs@datagen2db.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = Manageid
);
GO
/* CREATE AN EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT */
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS (
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			FIRST_ROW = 2,
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
        )
    );
GO

/* CREATE AN EXTERNAL TABLE FOR AIRBNB 2019*/

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.[2019] (
	[id] bigint,
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[host_id] bigint,
	[host_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood_group] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood] nvarchar(4000),
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[room_type] nvarchar(4000),
	[price] bigint,
	[minimum_nights] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews] bigint,
	[last_review] date,
	[reviews_per_month] float,
	[calculated_host_listings_count] bigint,
	[availability_365] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'NewYork Airbnb/2019.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Airbnb],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFormat]
	)
GO
/* CREATE AN EXTERNAL TABLE FOR AIRBNB 2023*/
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[2023] (
	[id] bigint,
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[host_id] bigint,
	[host_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood_group] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood] nvarchar(4000),
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[room_type] nvarchar(4000),
	[price] bigint,
	[minimum_nights] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews] bigint,
	[last_review] date,
	[reviews_per_month] float,
	[calculated_host_listings_count] bigint,
	[availability_365] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews_ltm] bigint
	/*[license] nvarchar(4000)*/
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'NewYork Airbnb/2023.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Airbnb],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[2024] (
	[id] bigint,
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[host_id] bigint,
	[host_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood_group] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood] nvarchar(4000),
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[room_type] nvarchar(4000),
	[price] float,
	[minimum_nights] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews] bigint,
	[last_review] date,
	[reviews_per_month] float,
	[calculated_host_listings_count] bigint,
	[availability_365] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews_ltm] bigint,
	[license] nvarchar(4000),
	[rating] nvarchar(4000),
	[bedrooms] nvarchar(4000),
	[beds] bigint,
	[baths] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'NewYork Airbnb/2024.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [Airbnb],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFormat]
	)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[2019]
